text: Heille is a hamlet in the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located on the Belgium border, about 2 km west of Aardenburg in the municipality of Sluis. Heille was a separate municipality until 1880.Ad van der Meer and Onno Boonstra, "Repertorium van Nederlandse gemeenten", KNAW, 2006. ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality in 1868. Category:Populated places in Zeeland Category:Former municipalities of Zeeland Category:Sluis
title: Heille
